text: Beautiful place to chill in the evening. The sunset hues with the trees and the backdrop of Our Tampines Hub & the HDB blocks makes it a great photo spot. The concentric grass circles will make a great photo too. This place is open to public 24-7. There are many seats around too so you can just walk your pet here n take a seat while they explore this place. There's a maze garden too. I walk past it regularly but only realized its beautiful evening view nowüòç

I think only few locals realise this is a labyrinth. Many may see it as a maze or random grass pattern. But a labyrinth can be a good place for meditative walks. I believe this is one of the biggest in Singapore. I wish more people appreciate the beauty of this labyrinth :)
Interesting maze for kids to run and find their way out.
My go to place if Tampines Hub were to have fireworks that day.
Good public garden...spacious,  one of the maze yet to grow full..After which for sure kids gonna just love it...
